org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api

Class IndexFieldMapper<N,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api.IndexFieldMapper<N,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the adapter field type
    I - the index field type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoOpIndexFieldMapper, SpatialFieldMapper, TemporalIntervalFieldMapper, TemporalLongFieldMapper

    public abstract class IndexFieldMapper<N,I>
extends Object
implements Persistable
    Abstract base class for mapping one or more adapter fields to a single index field. These field mappers are registered and discovered via SPI through the IndexFieldMapperRegistry.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  IndexFieldMapper.IndexFieldOptions
      Provides an open-ended interface so that custom index fields can provide any information to the mapper that may be needed.

      • initFromOptions

        protected void initFromOptions(List<FieldDescriptor<N>> inputFieldDescriptors,
                               IndexFieldMapper.IndexFieldOptions options)
        Initialize the field mapper with the given field descriptors and index field options.
        Parameters:
        inputFieldDescriptors - the adapter field descriptors to use in the mapping
        options - the index field options provided by the index

      • transformFieldDescriptors

        public void transformFieldDescriptors(FieldDescriptor<?>[] fieldDescriptors)
        As a performance measure, sometimes the queried data will vary from the data that was ingested. For example querying a spatial index with a custom CRS will return data in that CRS, even if the data was originally in a different CRS. This method transforms the adapter field descriptors to appropriately represent the queried data.
        Parameters:
        fieldDescriptors - the output field descriptors

      • getAdapterFields

        public String[] getAdapterFields()
        Returns:
        the adapter field names used in the mapping

      • getIndexOrderedAdapterFields

        public String[] getIndexOrderedAdapterFields()
        Returns:
        the adapter field names used in the mapping, ordered by the index dimensions they are associated with

      • indexFieldName

        public String indexFieldName()
        Returns:
        the index field used in the mapping

        Converts native field values to the value expected by the index.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the value to use in the index
